data.name: Doctor Doom
data.description: A master of technology and magic, Doctor Doom will stop at nothing to conquer Nexus Earth.

starItems.name: Doctor Doom
starItems.description: A master of technology and magic, Doctor Doom will stop at nothing to conquer Nexus Earth.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>+20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on the primary target and then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on the primary target and then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on the primary target and then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on the primary target and then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on the primary target and then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage per Doombot ally.

Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from all Doombot allies + attack them for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage per Doombot ally

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per Doombot ally.

Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from all Doombot allies + attack them for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> damage.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per Doombot ally.

Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from all Doombot allies + attack them for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per Doombot ally.

Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from all Doombot allies + attack them for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> damage.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per Doombot ally.

Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from all Doombot allies + attack them for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> damage.

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per Doombot ally.

Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from all Doombot allies + attack them for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per Doombot ally

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage per Doombot ally.

Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from all Doombot allies + attack them for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> damage.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self, the most injured non-summoned ally, and the ally with the highest Damage.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>100%</color> for self and the ally with the highest Damage.

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effect from self, the most injured non-summoned ally, and the ally with the highest Damage.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>100%</color> for self and the ally with the highest Damage.
2.nextUpgrade: Heal self and the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self, the most injured non-summoned ally, and the ally with the highest Damage.
Heal self and the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>100%</color> for self and the ally with the highest Damage.

4.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self, the most injured non-summoned ally, and the ally with the highest Damage.
Heal self and the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>200%</color> for self and the ally with the highest Damage.

5.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from self, the most injured non-summoned ally, and the ally with the highest Damage.
Heal self and the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>200%</color> for self and the ally with the highest Damage.

6.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Clear all negative effects from self, the most injured non-summoned ally, and the ally with the highest Damage.
Heal self and the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>200%</color> for self and the ally with the highest Damage.

7.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Clear all negative effects from self, the most injured non-summoned ally, and the ally with the highest Damage.
Heal self and the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>300%</color> for self and the ally with the highest Damage.

1.description:
On Turn, summon a Doombot and if this character has:
><color=#86e619>2</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> character is present.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade: On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

2.description:
On Turn, summon a Doombot and if this character has:
><color=#86e619>2</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
><color=#86e619>3</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> character is present.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade: When this character or a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, grant them Ability Energy and fill their Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>

3.description:
On Turn, summon a Doombot and if this character has:
><color=#86e619>2</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
><color=#86e619>3</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, grant them Ability Energy and fill their Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> character is present.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

4.description:
On Turn, summon a Doombot and if this character has:
><color=#86e619>2</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
><color=#86e619>3</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
><color=#86e619>4</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, grant them Ability Energy and fill their Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> character is present.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>30%</color>
Summoned Doombots gain their Passive Ability
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health

5.description:
On Turn, summon a Doombot and if this character has:
><color=#86e619>2</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
><color=#86e619>3</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
><color=#86e619>4</color> or more Doombot allies, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, grant them Ability Energy and fill their Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus if any <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> character is present.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
